name: Tobiloba Adedeji
bio: Frontend Engineer,Open source enthusiast and Accessibility Advocate

milestones.title: Started Learning Python
milestones.description: I was learning Python, but I stopped it after a month.

milestones.title: Started Learning Web development
milestones.description: Joined Nithub's 3-month Nitdev training for Frontend development

milestones.title: Social Media
milestones.description: Started becoming active on my Twitter account, I've had my Twitter account for years, but didn't know Tech Twitter

milestones.title: What I know
milestones.description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Typescript, Tailwind, Nodejs, React, Next, Python

milestones.title: Became a Software Engineer Intern
milestones.description: Did an interview and got an offer to become a software engineer intern at Nithub Unilag

milestones.title: Joined 4C as Website Maintainer
milestones.description: Became a maintainer of the 4c site and got the repo through Hacktoberfest 2022

milestones.title: Open-Source
milestones.description: My open source journey started during Hacktoberfest 2022 and during that time I was already a maintainer of 4c's website

milestones.title: Became Staff Member at 4c
milestones.description: Became staff member of the awesome community!

milestones.title: Became a maintainer of the Free Web3 Resources
milestones.description: Became a maintainer of a repo with over 3k stars on Github, providing value for those getting started with Web3

milestones.title: Took on the Programming Expert Course
milestones.description: Started the Programming Expert course to be a guide on my journey to becoming a Software Engineer
